updates.content:
Maintenance has begun.

The platform is now in read-only mode. All write operations will return a 503 error with code "PLATFORM_SCHEDULED_MAINTENANCE"

Calls to graphql.datocms.com continue to work correctly without interruptions.

There may be brief periods of time when the platform will stop responding to all requests, even read-only ones. In this scenario, calls to graphql.datocms.com already cached in our CDN will continue to work anyway.

We will continue to update the status page as soon as we have updates.
